title: Aiming to avoid Pfizer's Eucrisa failure, Arcutis wins FDA nod for Zoryve cream in psoriasis
author: Angus Liu
description: Pfizer once harbored blockbuster hopes for Eucrisa to be the next big topical treatment for inflammatory skin diseases. | Pfizer's Eucrisa never lived to become the next big topical treatment for inflammatory skin diseases. Now, young biotech Arcutis Biotherapeutics is bringing along a new therapy that goes after the same drug target but with a very different product profile.
